'''Mavuika''' is a playable {{Pyro}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Bearing the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name||'''Kiongozi'''|bearer=1}} and known by her {{w|Goetic}} name '''Haborym''', she is the current [[God]] of War and [[Pyro Archon]] presiding over [[Natlan]].
